tool_description: Extracts and categorizes relevant keywords from candidate profiles including skills, technologies, certifications, and industry terms using NLP techniques.

profile_text.description: Raw text content from candidate profile or resume

extraction_categories.description: Categories to extract (skills, technologies, certifications, companies, education)

minimum_confidence.description: Minimum confidence score for extracted keywords (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Empty profile text: Provide non-empty profile content for analysis
Invalid extraction categories: Use valid categories [skills, technologies, certifications, companies, education]
Invalid confidence threshold: minimum_confidence must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Profile too short: Profile text must contain at least 50 characters for meaningful extraction
usage: Input candidate profile text and optionally specify which keyword categories to extract. Adjust minimum_confidence to control extraction precision vs recall.

extracted_keywords.description: List of extracted keywords and phrases

keyword_categories.description: Corresponding categories for each extracted keyword

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each extracted keyword
